channel.title: Rsc server
channel.description: Hi, any suggestions on a rsc server? i used to play king pk which is missed. anything similar??

item.title: Rsc server
item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

[quote=“RSCRevolution, post:13, topic:536250”][quote author=arthur123 link=topic=655063.msg4386577#msg4386577 date=1385801948]
does anyone even play revolution?
[/quote]

We used to be between 5-10 players online since we did not really spend time advertising as we spend that same time working on updates, creating contents and applying fix .

Recently we are between 15-30 and noticed a wave of new registrations .

We will make sure to advertise everywhere once we are ready .

We are currently developing new mini games and working on some good content. We want to make sure that pkers will feel at home and have tons of things to do. We are focusing on that as we speak.

We will make sure there is a fierce competition in the rankings so the best teams and players can show their skills raising through ranks.[/quote]
I wish other servers never ruined my wants of the RSC scene. I have wasted a good 7 years or more on the RSC private servers… Other then that, I may check it out sometime.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc server
item.dc:creator: @sklem sklem
item.description:
@sklem wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:8, topic:536250"][quote author=arthur123 link=topic=655063.msg4386703#msg4386703 date=1385855606]
why does every1 lol? so theres no decent servers out now?
[/quote]
There’s RSCRevolution, I have no idea why people don’t play it. It’s the most developed server.[/quote]
In my opinion, the problem is that Revolution came out just a week or smth before MoparClassic. Since people were waiting for MoparClassic, sitting on reddit or IRC just to be first to access the game, they didn’t care about new servers prior to MoparClassic launch. Although registering to MoparClassic was made quite annoying, there were like 40-50 accounts (not unique, but still) during the first hour of launch running around lumbridge and rushing for chickens, mines etc.
Now when MoparClassic went down like 2 days after launch, the only long-term servers that could be taken seriously were RSCE with all their active years and Revolution with enthusiastic staff. The problem is that when MoparClassic went down, then those who were rushing to chickens and mines were not bothered to start again in a server that had been up for a week or smth because they had already had so much XP waste, so they went back to RSCE or real life.

My point is that RSC community is full of very competitive people and when the competition aspect is taken away, they just don’t bother playing. Revolution, in my opinion, is a very promising server that just started at the wrong time and there was not created enough buzz about the server.

Read full topic
